metadata.title: Autonymo | AI Operating Systems for Your Industry
metadata.description: We design, build, and deploy complete AI operating systems for Real Estate, Healthcare, and custom business solutions. Live in weeks, not months.

nav.newsletterDesc: Get the latest AI insights and product updates.
nav.blogsDesc: Insights on AI automation, industry trends, and strategies.
nav.caseStudiesDesc: See how businesses are running on Autonymo OS.
nav.realEstateOSDesc: AI-powered lead response, listing management, and contract automation for real estate agencies.
nav.healthServicesOSDesc: Smart scheduling, patient reactivation, and clinical documentation for modern practices.
nav.leadGenerationOSDesc: AI-powered lead capture, scoring, nurturing, and outbound calling to fill your pipeline automatically.
nav.customSolutionsDesc: Custom AI implementations tailored to your business workflows and industry.

hero.title: We build and run the AI systems
hero.subtitle: We deploy proven solutions, train your people, and continuously improve so your business stays ahead as AI evolves.

explainer.description: A connected suite of AI-powered tools built for your industry: automated lead response, smart scheduling, document generation, real-time dashboards, and more — all working together, replacing manual processes across your entire operation.

whatWeBuild.label: What We Build
whatWeBuild.title: Industry-specific AI platforms, not generic tools.
whatWeBuild.subtitle: Each system is built around your industry's actual workflows — integrated with your existing tools, ready to deploy in weeks.

realEstate.label: Real Estate OS
realEstate.tagline: Capture owners, respond to leads in seconds, run your agency on AI.

module1.title: Lead Response Engine
module1.description: Respond to portal leads in seconds via WhatsApp — not hours. Automatic pre-qualification, enrichment, and intelligent agent distribution.

module2.title: Active Listing Management
module2.description: Stale listing alerts, price monitoring, post-visit owner reports, and activity tracking for every property in your portfolio.

module3.title: Owner Relationship Engine
module3.description: Re-engage past owners with market updates and automated nurture sequences. Build trust before they consider switching agencies.

module4.title: Contract Automation
module4.description: Generate reserva, arras, and commission agreements in clicks. Document checklists and closing milestone tracking included.

healthServices.label: Health Services OS
healthServices.tagline: Reactivate patients, fill chairs, automate communication.

module1.title: Smart Scheduling
module1.description: AI-powered booking across practitioners. Automatically fills cancellation gaps, reduces no-shows, and optimizes chair time.

module2.title: Patient Reactivation
module2.description: Automated outreach to dormant patients with personalized recall campaigns. Re-engage patients who haven't visited in months.

module3.title: Patient Communication Hub
module3.description: Unified WhatsApp, email, and SMS communications. Automated confirmations, follow-ups, and post-visit review requests.

module4.title: Insurance & Documentation
module4.description: Automate eligibility checks, claims processing, and clinical note generation. Reduce admin burden and speed up reimbursements.

leadGeneration.label: Lead Gen OS
leadGeneration.tagline: Fill your calendar with qualified leads on autopilot.

module1.title: Multi-Channel Capture
module1.description: Capture leads from web forms, social ads, LinkedIn, landing pages, and referrals into one unified pipeline — enriched and scored automatically.

module2.title: AI Lead Scoring
module2.description: Score every lead in real time based on behavioral signals, firmographic data, and intent indicators. Prioritize the hottest opportunities.

module3.title: Smart Nurture Sequences
module3.description: Deploy personalized email, LinkedIn, and SMS campaigns that adapt content and timing based on each prospect's engagement.

module4.title: AI Outbound Calling
module4.description: Automated cold outreach and follow-up calls with AI voice agents that qualify prospects and book meetings on your behalf.

custom.label: Custom Solutions
custom.tagline: AI operations tailored to your industry and processes.

module1.title: Workflow Automation
module1.description: Map and automate any business process end-to-end — from simple task routing to complex multi-system orchestration.

module2.title: Custom AI Agents
module2.description: Purpose-built AI agents trained on your data and business logic. Not generic — designed around your specific operations.

module3.title: System Integration
module3.description: Connect CRMs, ERPs, databases, APIs, and legacy systems into one intelligent, automated ecosystem.

module4.title: Dashboards & Analytics
module4.description: Real-time operational dashboards designed around your KPIs, data sources, and decision-making workflows.

industryGrid.label: Industries
industryGrid.title: AI operating systems for your industry.
industryGrid.subtitle: We build complete AI systems tailored to how your industry actually works — not generic automation that needs months of customization.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: Automate lead response, listing management, and contracts for agencies and property managers.

healthcare.title: Healthcare & Dental
healthcare.description: Smart scheduling, patient reactivation, and clinical documentation for modern practices.

professional.title: Professional Services
professional.description: Streamline client intake, document generation, and project workflows for law firms, accounting, and consultancies.

industrial.title: Industrial & Manufacturing
industrial.description: Production monitoring, supply chain automation, and quality control systems for mid-market manufacturers.

agencies.title: Agencies
agencies.description: Scale service delivery, automate reporting, and increase client capacity without hiring.

other.title: Other Industries
other.description: Don't see your industry? We run an AI audit and build exactly what you need.

beforeAfter.label: Why Autonymo
beforeAfter.title: Your operations are about to change.
beforeAfter.subtitle: Stop patching workflows with spreadsheets and manual follow-ups. Start running on an intelligent operating system.

items.item1: Leads sit for hours — prospects move on before you respond
items.item2: Staff drowns in admin, data entry, and manual follow-ups
items.item3: Scaling means hiring more people for every new account
items.item4: Information scattered across tools, inboxes, and spreadsheets
items.item5: Decisions based on gut feeling, not real-time data
items.item6: Every new process takes months to set up and optimize

items.item1: AI responds to inquiries in seconds, 24/7 — no lead left behind
items.item2: Automated workflows handle the repetitive work so your team focuses on value
items.item3: Same team handles 3-5x more with AI doing the heavy lifting
items.item4: One unified system with real-time dashboards and connected data
items.item5: AI surfaces insights, spots patterns, and recommends actions
items.item6: New capabilities deployed in days, not months

beforeAfter.bottomNote: The teams already using Autonymo are operating at a different speed

deploy.title: Deploy
deploy.description: We build and configure AI systems on your existing tools. No rip-and-replace.

train.title: Train
train.description: We train your team to work alongside the new systems. No tech skills required.

evolve.title: Evolve
evolve.description: AI moves fast. We evaluate new capabilities and deploy what matters for YOUR business. You stay ahead.

cta.title: Ready to see what AI
cta.subtitle: Book a free 15-minute assessment. We'll show you where AI can make the biggest impact on your operations.
